title: The Big 2022 Gaming Preview
description: Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Tina Amini, Sam Claiborn, and Justin Davis -- are looking ahead to all the big games coming this year -- Breath of the Wild 2, God of War Ragnarok, Horizon Forbidden West, and more. And, of course, they play Video Game 20 Questions.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (Daemon Hatfield)

And, of course, they play Video Game 20 Questions.
